languages.text: "Придурка кусок, да что с тобой? Так сложно сказать "спасибо" за то, что она тебе задницу спасла?" {n}Идира раздраженно бубнит себе под нос, не решаясь говорить громче.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Придурка кусок, да что с тобой? Так сложно сказать "спасибо" за то, что она тебе задницу спасла?" {n}Идира раздраженно бубнит себе под нос, не решаясь сказать громче.{/n}

languages.text: "You moron, what is wrong with you? Is it so hard to just say, 'Thanks for saving my sorry hide just now'?" {n}Idira mutters under her breath in exasperation, not daring to raise her voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Придурка кусок, да что с тобой? Так сложно сказать "спасибо" за то, что она тебе задницу спасла?" {n}Идира раздраженно бубнит себе под нос, не решаясь говорить громче.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You moron, what is wrong with you? Is it so hard to just say, 'Thanks for saving my sorry hide just now'?" {n}Idira mutters under her breath in exasperation, not daring to her voice.{/n}

"You moron, what is wrong with you? Is it so hard to just say, 'Thanks for saving my sorry hide just now'?" {n}Idira mutters under her breath in exasperation, not daring to her raise her voice.{/n}

languages.text: « Pauvre imbécile, quel est votre problème ? Il suffit de dire : "Merci d'avoir sauvé ma misérable vie". Est-ce vraiment si difficile ? » {n}Idira grommelle d'un air exaspéré, sans oser pour autant élever la voix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You moron, what is wrong with you? Is it so hard to just say, 'Thanks for saving my sorry hide just now'?" {n}Idira mutters under her breath in exasperation, not daring to raise her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pauvre imbécile, quel est votre problème ? Il suffit de dire : "Merci d'avoir sauvé ma misérable vie". Est-ce vraiment si difficile ? » {n}Idira grommelle d'un air exaspéré, sans oser pour autant élever la voix.{/n}

languages.text: 「この低能が。何様のつもりなの？『助けてくれてありがとう』って言うのがそんなに難しいのかしら？」{n}イディラは声を荒げるのもウンザリな様子で、憤慨もあらわに息を吐くようにつぶやいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You moron, what is wrong with you? Is it so hard to just say, 'Thanks for saving my sorry hide just now'?" {n}Idira mutters under her breath in exasperation, not daring to raise her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この低能が。何様のつもりなの？『助けてくれてありがとう』って言うのがそんなに難しいのかしら？」{n}イディラは声を荒げるのもウンザリな様子で、憤慨もあらわに息を吐くようにつぶやいた。{/n}

languages.text: “你这个白痴，你到底有什么毛病？老老实实说一句‘谢谢你救了我这个废物一命’就这么难吗？”{n}伊迪拉恼怒地低声嘟囔着，不敢提高嗓门。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You moron, what is wrong with you? Is it so hard to just say, 'Thanks for saving my sorry hide just now'?" {n}Idira mutters under her breath in exasperation, not daring to raise her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你这个白痴，你到底有什么毛病？老老实实说一句‘谢谢你救了我这个废物一命’就这么难吗？”{n}伊迪拉恼怒地低声嘟囔着，不敢提高嗓门。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr Narr, was ist denn nur los mit Euch? Ist es so schwer, einfach zu sagen 'Danke, dass Ihr mir gerade meine erbärmliche Haut gerettet habt'?" {n}Idira murmelt ihre Worte nur in einem aufgebrachten Flüsterton, sie wagt es nicht, die Stimme zu erheben.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You moron, what is wrong with you? Is it so hard to just say, 'Thanks for saving my sorry hide just now'?" {n}Idira mutters under her breath in exasperation, not daring to raise her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Narr, was ist denn nur los mit Euch? Ist es so schwer, einfach zu sagen 'Danke, dass Ihr mir gerade meine erbärmliche Haut gerettet habt'?" {n}Idira murmelt ihre Worte nur in einem aufgebrachten Flüsterton, sie wagt es nicht, die Stimme zu erheben.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Serás imbécil! ¿Qué pasa contigo? ¿Tanto te cuesta decir "gracias por salvar mi miserable pellejo"?». {n}Idira masculla entre dientes, exasperada, sin atreverse a levantar la voz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You moron, what is wrong with you? Is it so hard to just say, 'Thanks for saving my sorry hide just now'?" {n}Idira mutters under her breath in exasperation, not daring to raise her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Serás imbécil! ¿Qué pasa contigo? ¿Tanto te cuesta decir "gracias por salvar mi miserable pellejo"?». {n}Idira masculla entre dientes, exasperada, sin atreverse a levantar la voz.{/n}

languages.text: "Seni sersem, derdin ne senin? Postunu kurtardığımız için teşekkür etmek bu kadar mı zor?" {n}İdira; çileden çıkmış olmasına rağmen sesini yükseltme riskine girmeden homurdanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You moron, what is wrong with you? Is it so hard to just say, 'Thanks for saving my sorry hide just now'?" {n}Idira mutters under her breath in exasperation, not daring to raise her voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seni sersem, derdin ne senin? 'Nalları dikmemi engellediğiniz için teşekkürler' demek bu kadar mı zor?" {n}İdira çileden çıkmış bir şekilde, hafifçe, sesini yükseltme riskine girmeden homurdanıyor.{/n}
